snatools 0.0.0.9000

Conversion to network objects.

Source: R/as_network.R
as_network.Rd

Convert objects of class igraph to network objects.

as_network(x)

# S3 method for bridge_net
as_network(x)

# S3 method for igraph
as_network(x)

# S3 method for network
as_network(x)

# S3 method for tbl_graph
as_network(x)

Arguments

x

igraph (igraph::graph) or tidygraph::tbl_graph object.

Value

A network::network object.

See also

as_igraph()

Examples

library(snatools)

crisis_in_cloister
#> IGRAPH a30ef3a DN-- 25 401 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), cloisterville (v/l), affect (e/n), time (e/n)
#> + edges from a30ef3a (vertex names):
#>  [1] John Bosco->Gregory     John Bosco->Gregory     John Bosco->Basil      
#>  [4] John Bosco->Basil       John Bosco->Peter       John Bosco->Bonaventure
#>  [7] John Bosco->Bonaventure John Bosco->Berthold    John Bosco->Mark       
#> [10] John Bosco->Mark        John Bosco->Victor      John Bosco->Ramuald    
#> [13] John Bosco->Ramuald     John Bosco->Ramuald     John Bosco->Louis      
#> [16] John Bosco->Winfrid     John Bosco->Hugh        John Bosco->Hugh       
#> [19] Gregory   ->John Bosco  Gregory   ->John Bosco  Gregory   ->Peter      
#> [22] Gregory   ->Peter       Gregory   ->Mark        Gregory   ->Mark       
#> + ... omitted several edges

crisis_in_cloister %>%
  as_network()
#>  Network attributes:
#>   vertices = 25 
#>   directed = TRUE 
#>   hyper = FALSE 
#>   loops = FALSE 
#>   multiple = TRUE 
#>   bipartite = FALSE 
#>   total edges= 401 
#>     missing edges= 0 
#>     non-missing edges= 401 
#> 
#>  Vertex attribute names: 
#>     .vrt_id cloisterville vertex.names 
#> 
#>  Edge attribute names: 
#>     .edg_id affect time 

florence
#> IGRAPH bd28944 UN-- 16 35 -- 
#> + attr: .vrt_id (v/n), name (v/c), wealth (v/n), priorate_seats (v/n),
#> | .edg_id (e/n), relation (e/c)
#> + edges from bd28944 (vertex names):
#>  [1] Barbadori   --Castellani   Barbadori   --Ginori      
#>  [3] Barbadori   --Medici       Barbadori   --Peruzzi     
#>  [5] Bischeri    --Guadagni     Bischeri    --Lamberteschi
#>  [7] Bischeri    --Peruzzi      Castellani  --Lamberteschi
#>  [9] Castellani  --Peruzzi      Ginori      --Medici      
#> [11] Guadagni    --Lamberteschi Lamberteschi--Peruzzi     
#> [13] Medici      --Pazzi        Medici      --Salviati    
#> + ... omitted several edges

florence %>%
  as_network()
#>  Network attributes:
#>   vertices = 16 
#>   directed = FALSE 
#>   hyper = FALSE 
#>   loops = FALSE 
#>   multiple = TRUE 
#>   bipartite = FALSE 
#>   total edges= 35 
#>     missing edges= 0 
#>     non-missing edges= 35 
#> 
#>  Vertex attribute names: 
#>     .vrt_id priorate_seats vertex.names wealth 
#> 
#>  Edge attribute names: 
#>     .edg_id relation 

# bipartite igraph to network =============================================================
southern_women
#> IGRAPH 024dfe5 UN-B 32 89 -- 
#> + attr: .vrt_id (v/n), name (v/c), .actor (v/l), type (v/l), .edg_id
#> | (e/n), event_date (e/c), event_month (e/n), event_day (e/n)
#> + edges from 024dfe5 (vertex names):
#>  [1] Evelyn   --E01 Evelyn   --E02 Evelyn   --E03 Evelyn   --E04 Evelyn   --E05
#>  [6] Evelyn   --E06 Evelyn   --E08 Evelyn   --E09 Laura    --E01 Laura    --E02
#> [11] Laura    --E03 Laura    --E05 Laura    --E06 Laura    --E07 Laura    --E08
#> [16] Theresa  --E02 Theresa  --E03 Theresa  --E04 Theresa  --E05 Theresa  --E06
#> [21] Theresa  --E07 Theresa  --E08 Theresa  --E09 Brenda   --E01 Brenda   --E03
#> [26] Brenda   --E04 Brenda   --E05 Brenda   --E06 Brenda   --E07 Brenda   --E08
#> [31] Charlotte--E03 Charlotte--E04 Charlotte--E05 Charlotte--E07 Frances  --E03
#> + ... omitted several edges

southern_women %>%
  as_network()
#>  Network attributes:
#>   vertices = 32 
#>   directed = FALSE 
#>   hyper = FALSE 
#>   loops = FALSE 
#>   multiple = FALSE 
#>   bipartite = 18 
#>   total edges= 89 
#>     missing edges= 0 
#>     non-missing edges= 89 
#> 
#>  Vertex attribute names: 
#>     .actor .vrt_id vertex.names 
#> 
#>  Edge attribute names: 
#>     .edg_id event_date event_day event_month 

# tidygraph to network ====================================================================
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidygraph))

tg <- crisis_in_cloister %>%
  as_tbl_graph()

tg
#> # A tbl_graph: 25 nodes and 401 edges
#> #
#> # A directed multigraph with 1 component
#> #
#> # Node Data: 25 x 2 (active)
#>   name        cloisterville
#>   <chr>       <lgl>        
#> 1 Leo         TRUE         
#> 2 Arsenius    TRUE         
#> 3 Bruno       TRUE         
#> 4 Thomas      TRUE         
#> 5 Bartholomew TRUE         
#> 6 John Bosco  FALSE        
#> # … with 19 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 401 x 4
#>    from    to affect  time
#>   <int> <int>  <int> <int>
#> 1     6     7      2     3
#> 2     6     7     -2     4
#> 3     6     8      2     2
#> # … with 398 more rows

tg %>%
  as_network()
#>  Network attributes:
#>   vertices = 25 
#>   directed = TRUE 
#>   hyper = FALSE 
#>   loops = FALSE 
#>   multiple = TRUE 
#>   bipartite = FALSE 
#>   total edges= 401 
#>     missing edges= 0 
#>     non-missing edges= 401 
#> 
#>  Vertex attribute names: 
#>     .vrt_id cloisterville vertex.names 
#> 
#>  Edge attribute names: 
#>     .edg_id affect time
